section.title: Solver Editor
section.para: The solver editor creates a solver configuration that can be run in the Execution Solver or plain Java code after the kjar is deployed

note.para: To see and use this editor, the user needs to have the role plannermgmt.

section.para: Use the Validate button to validate the solver configuration. This will actually build a Solver, so most issues in your project will present itself then, without the need to deploy and run it.
By default, the solver configuration will automatically scan for all planning entities and a planning solution classes. If none are found (or too many), validation will fail.
